resources.string: Everything about the Resurrection Remix OS
Show your support to Resurrection Remix OS
Get more information about Resurrection Remix OS
Be a member of Resurrection forum

● Founder 
● Project leader 
● Head developer 
● UX designer 
● Maintainer
List of devices and their official RR-OS maintainers
Send a PM to \'Varun Date\' at Hangouts containing the link to your ROM thread if you want your name to be added in Device Maintainers list.
Let people know you use Resurrection Remix OS
Reset all configurations to default values?
Enable/disable to show/hide floating button in configurations. Enter/exit once when switch used

Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Display the app icon corresponding with the toast

Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
This will hide all force close notificaitons
This will hide all immersive mode messages
Pick which apps to exclude from the recents panel
Enable or disable RAM bar in recent app view
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Enable to show RR-OS logo on the status bar
Close the color picker without applying the new color, (cancel).\nThis has the same effect as clicking the back button on the navigation bar.
Only shows the title, no additional functions
The color preview is always visible.\nIf the new color doesn\'t equals the old color, the color preview will be expanded, to allow apply the new color.

Shows the hex input field.
Hex values have to be in hex color format:
'#aarrggbb', ('alpha' (transparency), 'red', 'green' and 'blue').
The back button closes the hex input field without setting the hex value.
The apply button sets the hex value as new color without applying the new color.
Resets the new color to the default Android, Resurrection Remix or theme related color without applying the new color.
Shows/hides the favorites.\nHiding the favorites will not reset the favorite colors.
Pick a color to set a new color without applying the new color.\nThe color range can be changed using the slider on the right side

Favorites are empty by default.\nThe new color can be saved as a favorite at any time via long click, (a none empty favorite will be overwritten by the new color).\nA click sets the favorite color as new color, without applying the new color.
All palette colors have a fixed value.\nA click sets the palette color as new color, without applying the new color.
Change the enter/exit animation of the power menu
Change the view of the recents screen
Show 4g instead of LTE in signal icons
Show 3G instead of H+ in signal icons
Could not load %s. Make sure you have storage available.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
This option will only disable the power menu on secure lock screens
Double tap anywhere on lockscreen to put device to sleep
Battery icon will show up where the clear all button shows up
Battery bar position and color customization
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Use gradient color as a scale for the battery level
Allow override of default values with user config
Pulse will be triggered by pick up sensor
Pick up sensor will not be utilized as a trigger
Pulse will be triggered by notifications
Notifications will not be utilized as a trigger
Notifications will not be inverted. Use for dark themes.
Notifications will be inverted. Use for light/stock theme.
Longpress power menu when screen is off to activate torch
SELinux is a set of kernel modifications and user-space tools. Changing modes can cause unwanted effects. Use at your own risk.
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Longpress power button with screen off turns on torch

, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the reset option.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.

When only a right or left action is assigned, the action applies to the full bar

Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar when music plays. Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker

Pulse animates a smooth lava lamp style color blend
Medium press and drag to change position. Long press to show edit menu. Button position may be changed while menu is showing.

This tool allows you to delete system apps. Use with caution and only delete apps you know are safe to be removed.

Pre-written summaries will be selected at random and will change everytime you start the Settings app.\nThis overrides any custom summary set.

Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Blur background settings for system UI
Blur the background when you pull down the status bar
Set the background of notifications translucent
Make the background of quick settings transparent
Blur the background of recent apps activity
Blur personalizations are disabled during keyguard view! Only translucent notifications are enabled!

These colors are the ones tinting the blur background. Instead of the normal grey, you can now choose the colors in the way you like. 
 There are three color filters: One used for light backgrounds, one used for dark backgrounds and one used for light/dark backgrounds. 
 So how are these colors working?? 
 Simple, as the titles say, the light filter will be used for lighter backgrounds, dark filter for dark backgrounds and the mixed filter one will be used for backgrounds not too dark but neither too light. 
 These colors are used for both BlurBackgrounds: StatusBar one and RecentsApps one
Blur personalizations are disabled during Keyguard view! Only Translucent Notifications are enabled!
